A smart flashlight that uses AI to adjust its brightness and color temperature based on the environment ands.
A flashlight that can be controlled with voice commands, allowing for hands-free use.
A flashlight that has a built-in camera, allowing users to see in the dark while also capturing photos or videos.
A flashlight that can be charged wirelessly using a solar panel or other renewable energy source.
A flashlight that has a built-in GPS tracker, allowing users to easily find their way back to their starting point or to a specific location.
